txt.en: Collected nasturtium ([placeholder]/10)
Simple Salves, Part 2
Return to Heshra, the herbalist
Collect milk thistles ([placeholder]/10)
Administer simple salve to an afflicted villager

'I have a recipe that I believe could work to bring our people back to good health.

'Unfortunately, the hills around Khûtra are no longer safe for us to gather the herbs I need. Would you perhaps help? If you collect these herbs, I can prepare them into a salve to try to heal our animals and people. We may not know how to prevent this affliction, but we may yet stop it from spreading further.

'Please, collect the herbs I need. You can find most of them growing in the hills to the north. Our village depends on it.'
Administer simple salve to an afflicted villager
Collected sprigwort ([placeholder]/6)
Collect nasturtiums ([placeholder]/8)
Administer simple salve to an afflicted villager

'Fine quality there. Just a moment....

'There we are. Don't mind the smell! It confirms its potency. Please, give this to the afflicted villagers. They are below us, just past the farthest house to the east, on the rocks before the shore. If it works as it should, their pallid nature should fade and they should get more lively in minutes.

'I pray it does for all our sakes.'
Administered simple salve to an afflicted villager
Administer simple salve to an afflicted villager
Collect sprigwort ([placeholder]/6)
Administered simple salve to afflicted Khûtra villagers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Time is of the essence! Deliver the salve to those affected.'
Administer simple salve to an afflicted villager
Administer simple salve to an afflicted villager
Administered simple salve to diseased villagers ([placeholder]/3)
Heshra has asked you to collect various herbs for a simple salve to treat the disease.
Heshra, the herbalist, has asked you to collect various herbs for a simple salve to treat the disease. These herbs can be found in the hills north of Khûtra.
Administer the simple salve to the afflicted villagers. They can be found on the rocks just outside Khûtra, to the east near the shore.
'No change? That is ill news. We are no closer to finding the source of this disease or how to stop its spread.'
Return to Heshra, the herbalist
Return to Heshra the herbalist in the Elder Hall.
Administer simple salve to diseased villagers ([placeholder]/3)
Administered simple salve to an afflicted villager
Administered simple salve to an afflicted villager
Administered simple salve to an afflicted villager

Collect nasturtium ([placeholder]/10)
Administer simple salve to an afflicted villager
Collect sprigwort ([placeholder]/6)
Administer simple salve to afflicted Khûtra villagers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected milk thistles ([placeholder]/10)
Collected nasturtiums ([placeholder]/8)
'I need those herbs to make a salve for the villagers. Please bring them back to me, quick as you can.'
'We need those herbs for the salve. They can be found in the hills to the north. Please, there's no time to waste!'
Collected milk thistle ([placeholder]/8)
Collected sprigwort ([placeholder]/6)
